title: Goodreads Quotes Scraper
description: Extract inspirational quotes from Goodreads by tag, author, or search query. Supports pagination and automatic deduplication.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Goodreads quotes URL. If provided, this overrides tag/author/search parameters.

tag.title: Quote Tag
tag.description: Search quotes by tag (e.g., 'inspirational', 'love', 'wisdom', 'life'). Most popular option.

author.title: Author Name
author.description: Search quotes by author name (e.g., 'Albert Einstein', 'Maya Angelou'). Leave empty to use tag instead.

search.title: Search Query
search.description: Free-text search for quotes containing specific words or phrases.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of quotes
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of quotes to collect. Default is 100.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of pages to scrape. Each page typically contains 30 quotes.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for scraping. Residential proxies recommended for best reliability.
